You can convert MS Office 1997/2000/2003/XP files to MS Office 2007 format by opening them in MS Office 2007 and saving them with "Save As" in the new format.
On pote converter le files MS Office 1997/2000/2003/XP al formato MS Office 2007 per apertura in MS Office 2007 e salvamento con "Salva Como" in le formato nove.
You can customize the kaptain launch script so that your preferences are the defaults; simply edit the omegat.kaptn file in a text editor.
Tu pote personalisar le script kaptain lanceamento de maniera que tu preferentias sia le preparationes initial; redige simplemente le file omegat.kaptn in un editor de texto.
You can define out-of-turn tags.
Tu pote definir tags foras del torno.
You can delete the line:
Tu pote deler le linea:
You can eliminate this problem by specifying a tokenizer for the target language as well (where available), with the argument --ITokenizerTarget=.
Tu pote eliminar iste problema specificante (ubi disponibile) un tokenizer pro le lingua de destination, con le argumento --ITokenizerTarget=.
You can for example use it to select the user interface language, assign more memory to OmegaT, or enter a Google Translate password.
Tu pote per exemplo usar lo pro seliger le lingua del interfacie del usator, pro assignar plus de memoria a OmegaT, o scriber un contrasigno de Google Translate.
You can have as many "alternative translations" as you like of identical segments, but there can only be one default translation (or none at all).
Tu pote haber tante "traductiones alternative" quam tu vole de segmentos identic, ma il pote sol esser un traduction base (o necun del toto).
You can however use other software if you wish.
Totevia il es possibile usar altere softwares, se on lo desira

You can level the formatting of paragraphs essentially by copying whole paragraphs in MS Word and pasting them back over themselves such that the entire paragraph assumes the formatting of the first character.
Tu pote nivellar le formato de paragrapho essentialmente copiante paragraphos integre in MS Word e los collar back super se ipse assi como le paragrapho integre assume le formato del prime character.
You can modify, correct, add or delete information at your own discretion.
On pote modificar, corriger, adder o eliminar informationes a proprie discretion.
You can now translate the text (see screenshot).
Tu ora pote render le texto (vide imagine del schermo).
You can presumably resolve this by obtaining and installing the necessary fonts; or you can select a different font for this purpose – which may or may not be an adequate solution.

Tu pote presumibilemente resolver iste problema obtenente e installante le typo de character necessari; o tu pote seliger un differente typo de character pro iste proposito – le qual poterea esser un solution adequate o minus.
You can simplify launching by writing a script file, i.e. a plain-text file containing these two lines.
Tu pote simplificar le lanceamento con le scriptura de un file script, id es un file de texto simple continente iste duo lineas.

You can still use the browser solution described above to preview the translations of these files, but you will then also need a) a converter to convert the file to .html format, and b) a utility to launch the converter automatically so that you don't have to convert the files manually.

Tu ancora pote usar le solution lector del tela describite supra pro le vista preliminar del traductiones de iste files, ma tu necessitara alsi: a) un convertitor pro converter le file al formato .html, e b) un utilitate pro lancear le convertitor automaticamente de maniera que tu non debe converter le files manualmente
You can test this with the relevant command below on the command line (terminal/console/DOS prompt).
Tu pote probar isto con le commando pertinente in sequito sur le linea de commando (terminal/consola/prompte DOS).
You can then enter a new shortcut and assign it with Assign as you did before.
Tu pote dunque scriber un via breve nove e assignar lo con Assigna como tu ha facite anteriormente.
You can use a similar procedure to create a button for your macro:
Tu pote usar un procedura simile pro crear un button pro tu macro:
You do not have to translate a complete package; you can, for instance, translate just the user interface (Bundle.properties), or just the instant start tutorial.
Tu non debe traducer un pacchetto complete; il es possibile, per exemplo, render solmente le Interfacie del usator (equipamento), o solmente le Guida de initio rapide.
You do not need to create an OmegaT project as you normally would.
I non es necessari crear un projecto OmegaT como on facerea normalmente.
You have complete freedom in how you translate.
Tu ha complete libertate re como render..
You may also be able to right-click with the mouse on the file, then select a text editor in which to open it.
Tu pote alsi cliccar con le dextero con le mouse sur le file, pois seliger un editor de texto in le qual aperir lo
You may find that segments are broken by hard line breaks at inconvenient places.
Tu pote trovar que le segmentos es rupte per interruptiones de linea, dur, in locos incommode.
You may find that the embedded fonts in the PDF do not contain all the characters you need.
Tu pote trovar que le typo de character incastrate in the PDF non contine omne le characteres que tu necessita.

You may prefer <i0>not</i0> to use your usual browser for the preview function so as to keep it free for Internet browsing rather than having constantly to switch tabs, so you can regard installing an additional browser for the preview function as an advantage.

Tu pote preferer <i0>non</i0> usar tu lector del tela ordinari pro le function vista preliminar, como anque retener lo libere pro navigar in interrete plus tosto que deber constantemente cambiar linguettas, assi tu pote reguardar le installation de un altere lector del tela pro le function vista preliminar como un avantage.
You must still handle tags properly when producing and editing your translation, but you can view it in a separate window without the clutter of tags ("tag soup").
Tu debe ancora tractar tags debitemente quando produce e modifica tu traduction, ma tu pote vider lo in un fenestra separate sin incombramento de tags ("suppa de tag").
You now have a preview function.
Tu ora ha un function de vista preliminar.
You should see the macro command appear in the right-hand column.
Tu deberea vider apparer in le columna dextere le commando macro.
You will be credited as the author of your work and named as joint copyright holder.
Tu essera accreditate como le autor de tu obra e nominate como detentor del copyright conjuncte.
Your browser won't automatically scroll as you work through the text; you have to do that yourself.
Tu lector del tela non rolara automaticamente durante que tu laborar al transverso del texto; tu debe facer lo tu mesme.
Your documents and translation memories remain on your computer, and the OmegaT project will have no access to your work or information.
Tu documentos e memorias de traduction remane sur tu computator, e le projecto OmegaT non habera ulle accesso a tu obras o informationes.
